A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed The Last Jedi. The movie is a poem about the force and tries to help us see precisely why people are drawn to the dark side. The only let down I had was that I had hoped we'd get a Snoke origin story as an ancient being who has managed to continue existing throughout history\, and this character was cast aside pretty quickly. That said\, I really loved how the movie dealt with Luke\, and other major characters. It's important to remember that this is one chapter of a saga. This is not the entirety of the story\, it's a piece of it. The movie sets out to create its own identity\, and I believe it's a welcome addition to the Star Wars universe.
